thayilanthaye sancharaka paradisayak lesa salakena huwa hin pradeshaye siduwu bomba pipirim dekakin ek pudgalayeku jiwithakshayata pathwa thawath 11 deneku thuwala laba athi bawa wides wartha pawasayi.bankok aganurawata kilomitar 200k pamana obben wu mema sancharaka purawaraya pihita athi athara, mema praharayen wideshikayan kihipa denekuda thuwala laba athi bawa kiyaweyi.ehidi, palamu pipirima dewani pipirimata wada prabalathwayen adu bawath, palamu pipirimen kanthawak jiwithakshayata pathwa athi bawath wartha weyi.bomba mal pochchi thula sangawa thibu bawath eewa mitar 50k athulatha pupura gos athi bawath kiyaweyi.ehidi, paya bhagayaka kalayak thula mema bomba pupuruwa harimata jangama durakathana bhawitha kara athi bawa kiyaweyi.thayilanthaye dakunudiga palathe mewani bomba pipirim wartha wuwath, sancharakayan gawasena sthanayaka mewani pipirimak siduwima kalathurakin siduwannaki.
